title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.51 - Grounding of tank vehicle during operation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.51 - Grounding of tank vehicle during operation

State Regulations

During filling of the cargo tank, the tank vehicle
shall be grounded together with the tank truck filling rack and inflammable
liquid discharge piping to a point of zero electrical
potential. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.51

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
